title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Restaurant Competitiveness Evaluation Through Online Review Text Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, text data processing experience, and foundational understanding of machine learning
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: They can identify comparative sentences in online review texts with 85% accuracy.
They can extract at least three competitive factors of restaurants (menu, service, price, etc.) by applying comparative relationship classification rules.
They can quantify relative strengths/weaknesses compared to competitors using a sentiment scoring system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
